Authenticate to API

Source: R/connect.R
authenticate.Rd

authenticate is a wrapper around req_oauth_auth_code. It receives a request and a OAuth list, returning a modified request.

Usage

authenticate(req, oal = NULL)

Arguments

req

A request

oal

An OAuth list return by oauth() with a oauth_client, the auth_url, the redirect_uri and the scope

Value

A modified HTTP request that will use OAuth;

On this page

Developed by Fabio Steffen, Noemia Bruderer.
